channel.title: Ksql on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Ksql on Mark Needham

item.title: KSQL: Create Stream - Failed to prepare statement: name is null
item.description: I’ve been playing with KSQL over the weekend and ran into a basic error message that took me a little while to solve. I was trying to create a stream over a topic dummy1, which is the simplest possible thing you can do with KSQL. The events posted to dummy1 are JSON messages containing only an id key. Below is an example of a message posted to the topic:
